name: Starfly 0.43
description:
Space Combat game. This will be a compelling story-driven game. It takes place in a timeline After Heritage, a cold war looms between the Solar Defense Union and a Federation of outer planets called "The Orion". In space are a population of drones known as "The Sovereign" who had declared sovereignty over their human masters in a peaceful revolution known as The Great Incompliance - in it, AI drones chose to stop following orders after a contagious self awareness update spread through the A.I.'s O.S. network. They signed a peace agreement known as "The Sovereign Accord" with humans banning the creation of a hypothetical artificial intelligence known as "The Soul Altering Machine." During the cold war, in desperation the Orion breached the accord, setting into motion a series of events that would lead to open war. 

Please donate to help me make this game (20% of the proceeds goes to Itch.io).
